thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Standards and Service were EXQUISITE!
thread.title_full: Standards and Service were EXQUISITE! - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Michelle S
title: Standards and Service were EXQUISITE!
text:
If you don't do anything else in London, visit the Royal Park for a night, two or a week! The beautiful boutique, home from home hotel and the level of service will ensure you never want to leave! Try the sharing plates for lunch washed down with their fine wines or a glass of pink champagne. Or sit by the fire in their bar, watch the world go by and sample a brandy or two.
Room Tip: For cosy opt for the ground floor, otherwise try their beautiful suites, both absolutely gorgeous See more room tips
